parameters.name: code
code
parameters.value:
import json, urllib.request, re

results = self.full_execution.get("results", []) if isinstance(self.full_execution, dict) else []
prev_data = {}
for r in results:
    if r.get("action", {}).get("label") == "query_honeypot_data":
        try:
            p = json.loads(r.get("result", "{}"))
            prev_data = p.get("message", p) if isinstance(p, dict) else {}
        except:
            prev_data = {}

stats = prev_data.get("stats", {})
if not stats:
    print(json.dumps({"report": "No honeypot data available.", "discord_msg1": "Honeypot Intel: No data this week.", "discord_msg2": "", "stats_summary": {}}))
    import sys; sys.exit(0)

creds = stats.get("creds", {})
access = stats.get("access", {})
wazuh = stats.get("wazuh", {})
s = stats.get("summary", {})

summary_parts = []
summary_parts.append("CREDENTIAL DATA: " + str(creds.get("total_attempts", 0)) + " login attempts, " + str(creds.get("unique_pairs", 0)) + " unique credential pairs")
summary_parts.append("Top usernames: " + ", ".join(creds.get("top_usernames", [])[:5]))
summary_parts.append("Top passwords: " + ", ".join(creds.get("top_passwords", [])[:5]))
summary_parts.append("ACCESS DATA: " + str(access.get("total_requests", 0)) + " HTTP requests from " + str(access.get("unique_ips", 0)) + " unique IPs")
top_ips_str = ", ".join([ip["ip"] + " (" + str(ip["count"]) + ")" for ip in access.get("top_ips", [])[:3]])
summary_parts.append("Top IPs: " + top_ips_str)
summary_parts.append("User agents: " + ", ".join(access.get("top_agents", [])[:3]))
summary_parts.append("WAZUH ALERTS: " + str(wazuh.get("total_alerts", 0)) + " alerts")
top_rules_str = ", ".join([r["rule"] + " (" + str(r["count"]) + ")" for r in wazuh.get("top_rules", [])[:3]])
summary_parts.append("Top rules: " + top_rules_str)
summary_parts.append("MITRE techniques: " + ", ".join(wazuh.get("top_mitre", [])[:5]))
top_countries_str = ", ".join([c["country"] + " (" + str(c["count"]) + ")" for c in wazuh.get("top_countries", [])[:5]])
summary_parts.append("Top countries: " + top_countries_str)

wow = s.get("wow", {})
if wow:
    summary_parts.append("WEEK-OVER-WEEK: attempt change " + str(wow.get("attempt_change_pct", "N/A")) + "%, IP change " + str(wow.get("ip_change_pct", "N/A")) + "%")

data_summary = ". ".join(summary_parts)

try:
    prompt = "/no_think Write a concise weekly intelligence report for a GCP WordPress login honeypot. Data: " + data_summary + ". Sections: 1) Executive Summary (2-3 sentences) 2) Credential Analysis 3) Network Analysis 4) Technique Analysis 5) Week-over-Week Changes 6) Collection Gaps or Notes. Keep each section to 2-3 sentences."
    payload = json.dumps({
        "model": "qwen3:8b",
        "prompt": prompt,
        "system": "You are a CTI analyst writing a weekly honeypot intelligence report. The honeypot is a PHP WordPress login lure on a GCP VM (34.48.201.94). It captures credential attempts and access patterns. Your audience is a SOC operator in a home lab. Be factual and concise.",
        "stream": False,
        "keep_alive": "24h",
        "options": {"num_predict": 3000, "temperature": 0.3}
    }).encode()
    req = urllib.request.Request("$ollama_url/api/generate",
        data=payload, headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"}, method="POST")
    resp = urllib.request.urlopen(req, timeout=180)
    raw = json.loads(resp.read().decode()).get("response", "")
    report = re.sub(r"<think>.*?</think>", "", raw, flags=re.DOTALL).strip()
    if not report:
        report = "LLM returned empty response."
except Exception as e:
    report = "LLM error: " + str(e)[:200]

discord_header = "**Weekly Honeypot Intel Report**"
discord_body = report.replace("\n", " ").replace("\r", "").replace('"', "'").replace("\\", "")
discord_full = discord_header + "\\n" + discord_body

if len(discord_full) > 1950:
    mid = len(discord_body) // 2
    discord_msg1 = discord_header + "\\n" + discord_body[:mid].rstrip() + "..."
    discord_msg2 = "..." + discord_body[mid:].lstrip()
    if len(discord_msg1) > 1950:
        discord_msg1 = discord_msg1[:1947] + "..."
    if len(discord_msg2) > 1950:
        discord_msg2 = discord_msg2[:1947] + "..."
else:
    discord_msg1 = discord_full
    discord_msg2 = ""

print(json.dumps({
    "report": report,
    "discord_msg1": discord_msg1,
    "discord_msg2": discord_msg2,
    "stats_summary": s
}))

parameters.name: code
parameters.value:
import json, urllib.request, ssl, base64, datetime

ctx = ssl.create_default_context()
ctx.check_hostname = False
ctx.verify_mode = ssl.CERT_NONE

elk_auth = base64.b64encode("$elk_user:$elk_pass".encode()).decode()
elk_headers = {"Content-Type": "application/json", "Authorization": "Basic " + elk_auth}

results = self.full_execution.get("results", []) if isinstance(self.full_execution, dict) else []
query_data = {}
report_data = {}
for r in results:
    label = r.get("action", {}).get("label", "")
    try:
        p = json.loads(r.get("result", "{}"))
        parsed = p.get("message", p) if isinstance(p, dict) else {}
    except:
        parsed = {}
    if label == "query_honeypot_data":
        query_data = parsed
    elif label == "generate_intel_report":
        report_data = parsed

stats = query_data.get("stats", {})
s = stats.get("summary", {})
now = datetime.datetime.utcnow()
week_id = now.strftime("%Y-W%W")

doc = {
    "@timestamp": now.strftime("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ"),
    "week_id": week_id,
    "total_attempts": s.get("total_attempts", 0),
    "unique_ips": s.get("unique_ips", 0),
    "unique_cred_pairs": s.get("unique_cred_pairs", 0),
    "top_usernames": stats.get("creds", {}).get("top_usernames", []),
    "top_passwords": stats.get("creds", {}).get("top_passwords", []),
    "top_source_ips": [ip["ip"] for ip in stats.get("access", {}).get("top_ips", [])[:5]],
    "top_countries": [c["country"] for c in stats.get("wazuh", {}).get("top_countries", [])[:5]],
    "top_mitre_techniques": stats.get("wazuh", {}).get("top_mitre", []),
    "top_wazuh_rules": [r["rule"] for r in stats.get("wazuh", {}).get("top_rules", [])[:5]],
    "wow_attempt_change_pct": s.get("wow", {}).get("attempt_change_pct", 0),
    "wow_unique_ip_change_pct": s.get("wow", {}).get("ip_change_pct", 0),
    "llm_report": report_data.get("report", ""),
    "raw_stats": stats
}

errors = []
try:
    req = urllib.request.Request("$elk_url/honeypot-intel/_doc",
        data=json.dumps(doc).encode(), headers=elk_headers, method="POST")
    resp = urllib.request.urlopen(req, context=ctx, timeout=10)
    result = json.loads(resp.read().decode())
    doc_id = result.get("_id", "?")
except Exception as e:
    doc_id = "ERROR"
    errors.append(str(e)[:100])

print(json.dumps({
    "doc_id": doc_id,
    "errors": errors,
    "discord_msg1": report_data.get("discord_msg1", "Honeypot Intel: write complete."),
    "discord_msg2": report_data.get("discord_msg2", "")
}))

name: Workflow 7: Honeypot Intel Report
description: Weekly (Sunday): queries ELK honeypot indices for past 7 days, generates CTI analyst report via Ollama, writes to ELK honeypot-intel index, posts to Discord.
